snippet: Mr. Bao, the son of Wang Yu, a lawyer who was detained in Beijing in July, was taken from a guesthouse in Mong La, a rights campaigner said.
abstract: Human rights activist Fengsuo Zhou says Bao Zhuoxuan, teenage son of detained Chinese human rights lawyer Wang Yu, is missing in Myanmar after he was apparently detained by authorities in border town while attempting to leave China.

byline.contributor: Wai Moe contributed reporting from Yangon, Myanmar.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bao, the son of Wang Yu, a lawyer who was detained in Beijing in July, was taken from a guesthouse in Mong La, a rights campaigner said.

headline.main: Bao Zhuoxuan, Son of Detained Rights Lawyer, Is Said to Disappear in Myanmar
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Myanmar: Son of a Chinese Detainee Disappears While Planning an Escape

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
